1.0.name: wordpress/tweetonpost
1.0.description: This plugin will tweet from your Twitter account when you publish a new blog post. It will also show those tweets as being from your site in the tweet's "source". This plugin requires you to have the php_curl library on your server and requires you to create an OAuth client on twitter.com.
